mapper.select: SELECT notice_no noticeNo, department_code departmentCode, writer writer, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, views views, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM total_notice

SELECT notice_no noticeNo, department_code departmentCode, writer writer, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, views views, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate FROM total_notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO total_notice( notice_title, notice_content, writer, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{writer}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE total_notice SET views = views + 1 WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
UPDATE total_notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, update_date = now() WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
